name: Comboed
description:
Charge through the map, bashing into enemies along the way to rack up points and go for a long string of combos. Three different dashes allow for quickly chaining strikes together. Reach the end of the map and go for a high score!

Controls:

Left Mouse - Move

Right Mouse - Dash

W/Up Arrow - Change to Quick Dash

A/Left Arrow - Change to Strong Dash

D/Right Arrow - Change to Shielded Dash

Shift + Q - Clear save

T - Plant tree* (you only get one tree)

*Tree does not have any effect on gameplay

Made for GTMK Game Jam 2021.
